meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lauren Stripling Shawn Moore Kyle Jones Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7819.

td.p: Lauren Stripling, a teaching artist from New York, New York
Shawn Moore, a regional human resources manager from Miami, Florida
Kyle Jones, a music teacher from Aurora, Colorado (whose 1-day cash winnings total $28,401)

tr.td: AT 35
(Alex: Just like our show.)
SAME FIRST & LAST LETTER
BAD FOLKS IN BOOKS
I GOT A FEVER
THE ONLY PRESCRIPTION
MORE COWBELL

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Kyle: Who is Kennedy?)
(Alex: Which one?)
(Kyle: [*].)

JFK

Kyle
')

div.onmouseover:

LaurenWhat is Indianapolis?
$6,600
ShawnWhat Iwo Jima?
$8,000
KyleWhat is Dallas?
$7,201
South Bend, Indiana')
